CHAT.comment: Scene takes place at a small table behind living room couch; Andrea and Steven sitting across from each other with Steven's lunch tray in the middle.
Noontime , living room , Andrea and Rolf reading to , talking to , and singing to Steven while Steven has lunch

Andrea reads books Oh My , Oh My , Oh Dinosaurs! Spot Looks at Colors , and other Spot books; Andrea spoonfeeds Steven his soup; Rolf later replaces Andrea as childcaregiver for last two minutes of this taped segment , cuts Steven's bagel for him , sings John Jacob Jingleheimerschmidt to him.

u.a: Andrea is reading the part of the dinosaur book where the dinosaurs are crammed into an elevator
The final word green is whispered .
Andrea waves goodbye when saying bye bye
numa/li kupoUn/ ? la kUpoUn/ l6 k
Andrea's addressing Rolf , who's out of the room . She raises her voice to be heard over the Lara's crying .
Andrea feeds Steven soup with a spoon .
Andrea leaves scene for a second , brings back a set of keys for Steven . Steven uses the keys to open the doors in the book .
The audiotape is not clear here .
Andrea turns her attention back to the story she is reading to Steven . Her intonation is highly inflectional "motherese" style .
Very close to adult English , l appears long .
lots_of rising inflection on the second instance of giggling .
kiki is Steven's word for carrot .
ba is CHI's word for red
bada is CHI's word for sofa .
nI spat iz waI ov6 hiy6
